com.wikitude.tracker

Interface CloudTracker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Tracker<CloudTrackerEventListener>

    public interface CloudTracker
extends Tracker<CloudTrackerEventListener>
    Interface to control CloudTrackers

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.wikitude.tracker.Tracker

        Tracker.TrackingType

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deactivateContinuousRecognitionHandling()
      Deactivates the automatic continuous recognition handling, this means the CloudTracker won't stop to try recognizing new targets even if it already tracking.

    • Method Detail

      • startContinuousRecognition

        void startContinuousRecognition(double interval_)
        Starts the continuous recognition mode
        Parameters:
        interval_ - The time span in which the CloudTracker should try to recognize a target in milliseconds (suggested value: 1500-2000)

      • stopContinuousRecognition

        void stopContinuousRecognition()
        Stops the continuous recognition mode

      • deactivateContinuousRecognitionHandling

        void deactivateContinuousRecognitionHandling()
        Deactivates the automatic continuous recognition handling, this means the CloudTracker won't stop to try recognizing new targets even if it already tracking. If deactivated, you will need to call stopContinuousRecognition manually, otherwise tracking quality will suffer.

      • recognize

        void recognize()
        Starts a single recognition attempt

      • getAuthenticationToken

        java.lang.String getAuthenticationToken()
        Getter for the authentication token of this CloudTracker
        Returns:
        The authentication token of this CloudTracker

      • getCollectionId

        java.lang.String getCollectionId()
        Getter for the collection id of this CloudTracker
        Returns:
        The collection id of this CloudTracker
